intro.title: Introduction
intro.description: Abhishek Yadav is a software engineer trainee at Techdome Solutions and a recent graduate in Computer Science and Engineering. With hands-on experience in end-to-end software development, he loves problem-solving and is passionate about building efficient and scalable web applications. Abhishek is continuously exploring innovative solutions to deliver optimal user experiences.

Techdome.achievements: Taking ownership of end-to-end features, from frontend design to backend implementation.; Delivered the requirement with each sprint following agile model, meeting all the deadlines for the release.; Created multiple sections for the Sparrow App (API Testing Platform) using Tech Stack such as Svelte, SCSS, Nest.js, TypeScript, Bootstrap

Travander.achievements: Managed state for the traveler module with Context API, overseeing data flows across 40+ components and integrating REST APIs.; Implemented form validation with React Hook Form & Zod, optimized infinite scroll for trips and bookings (improving load times by 25%), and integrated secure payment processing with Razorpay for 100+ daily transactions.

Tublian.achievements: Developed an AI ChatBot for personalized tutoring, enhancing engagement by 40%.; Contributed to Tublianâ€™s 8020 roadmap generator, boosting performance by 10%.

Primary.description: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, Next.js, Node.js

Secondary.description: Redux toolkit, Svelte, GraphQL, Git, TypeScript, MongoDB, SQL, Tailwind

Other.description: Core Java (Java 8/9, Multithreading), CI/CD, Cloud (AWS/Azure/GCP), Microservices (REST API, SOAP, Event & Message-Based), Docker, Containerization, SOLID Principles, Caching (Redis), Monitoring (Grafana)
